summary: This document is an email chain from July 2021 discussing the trial date for the Ghislaine Maxwell case and noting that an Acting AAG will return a call from Congresswoman Frankel. It shows communication about the legal proceedings.

persons.name: Frankel
persons.context: Mentioned as a Congresswoman whose call will be returned by an Acting AAG regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her criminal case trial date is confirmed as November 29, 2021, in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Date Set
events.description: The trial date for the Ghislaine Maxwell case is confirmed as November 29, 2021.

events.title: Acting AAG to Return Congresswoman's Call
events.description: An Acting Assistant Attorney General (AAG) is scheduled to return a call from Congresswoman Frankel regarding the Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The trial date for Ghislaine Maxwell's case was confirmed as November 29, 2021.
Congresswoman Frankel was in contact with the Department of Justice regarding the Maxwell case.
An Acting Assistant Attorney General (AAG) was to return Congresswoman Frankel's call the following morning.
The communication originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
